name: Winds of Essence
description:
Completed final project for level design in Fall 2021. 

Travel though a magical platforming adventure featuring low-poly graphics and soothing sound design.

3D Model credits:

Rock Pack: SimplePolyGames’ Stylized Mixed Rocks on Unreal Marketplace

Trees/Bushes Pack: Mokawyler’s Low Poly Fantasy Tree Pack on Unreal Marketplace

Coins: Modeled myself
